import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserGuide=_ref=>{let{isVisible:externalVisible,onHide}=_ref;const[internalVisible,setInternalVisible]=useState(false);const[currentStep,setCurrentStep]=useState(0);const[hasSeenGuide,setHasSeenGuide]=useState(false);const isVisible=externalVisible||internalVisible;const steps=[{title:"Welcome to QuickDiff! üöÄ",content:"

QuickDiff is a powerful text comparison tool that helps you find differences between texts quickly and efficiently.

Key Features:

  • 🔍 Multiple comparison modes (line, word, character)
  • 🎨 Dark/Light themes with high contrast support
  • 🤖 AI-powered text analysis
  • 📁 File upload support
  • 📊 Export results in multiple formats
  • ⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts for efficiency
",target:".quickdiff-app"},{title:"Settings Panel üõ†Ô∏è",content:"

Configure your comparison preferences:

  • Diff Mode: Choose between line-by-line, word-by-word, or character-level comparison
  • View Mode: Side-by-side or inline view
  • Language: Auto-detect or manually select programming language for syntax highlighting
  • Ignore Options: Skip case, whitespace, or punctuation differences
  • Live Preview: Automatically compare as you type
",target:".settings-panel"},{title:"Input Your Text üìù",content:"

Add your text to compare:

  • Type directly: Paste or type text in the text areas
  • Upload files: Click "Load File" or drag & drop files
  • Supported formats: .txt, .md, .json, .html, .js, .py, .css

Tip: The app will auto-detect the programming language for better highlighting!

",target:".input-section"},{title:"Control Panel üéÆ",content:"

Use these controls to manage your comparison:

  • Compare Texts: Start the comparison process
  • Clear All: Remove all text and results
  • Swap Texts: Exchange original and changed text
  • Export: Save results as TXT, HTML, Markdown, or PDF
  • AI Tools: Get intelligent analysis of your text differences
",target:".controls"},{title:"Keyboard Shortcuts ‚å®Ô∏è",content:"

Speed up your workflow with these shortcuts:

  • Ctrl+Enter: Compare texts
  • Ctrl+K: Clear all content
  • Ctrl+S: Swap texts
  • Ctrl+C: Copy results (when visible)
  • Ctrl+D: Toggle dark/light theme
  • Ctrl+H: Toggle high contrast mode
  • Ctrl+M: Toggle minimap
  • Ctrl+↑/↓: Navigate between changes
  • Escape: Clear AI results
",target:".quickdiff-app"},{title:"AI Analysis ü§ñ",content:"

Get intelligent insights about your text differences:

  • Explain: Get detailed explanations of changes
  • Rewrite: Suggestions for improving the text
  • Summary: Quick overview of main changes
  • Tone: Analysis of writing tone and style
  • Cleanup: Recommendations for text cleanup

Note: AI analysis provides simulated results for demonstration purposes.

",target:".controls"},{title:"You're All Set! üéâ",content:"

You're now ready to use QuickDiff effectively!

Quick Start:

  1. Paste your original text in the left area
  2. Paste your changed text in the right area
  3. Click "Compare Texts" or press Ctrl+Enter
  4. Explore the results and use AI analysis for deeper insights

Need help? Click the ❓ button in the header anytime to see this guide again.

Happy comparing! 🚀
